title: Spatial Navigation Skill Acquisition Process Using Dynamic Visualization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic spatial perception skills and VR device usage experience
context.additional_context: Practical space cognition training program for working professionals. Aims to improve work efficiency through the application of mathematical spatial concepts.

learning_goals: Learners can design the shortest path to a destination in a 3D virtual space with 90% accuracy.
Learners are assessed on their ability to convert spatial structures into a 3D coordinate system using dynamic visualization materials.
Learners can identify and make decisions based on visual cues in complex maze environments with over 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
